titles.title: Lo! He Comes with Clouds Descending

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lo! He comes with clouds descending, Once for favored sinners slain; Thousand, thousand saints attending, Swell the triumph of His train: Alleluia! Alleluia! God appears on earth to reign.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Every eye shall now behold Him Robed in dreadful majesty; Those who set at naught and sold Him, Pierced and nailed Him to the tree, Deeply wailing, deeply wailing, Shall the true Messiah see.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now redemption, long expected, See in solemn pomp appear; All His saints, by man rejected, Now shall meet Him in the air: Alleluia! Alleluia! See the day of God appear!

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: 'Tis Thy heavenly bride and Spirit, Jesus Lord! that nid Thee come; All the glory to inherit, And to take Thy people home: All creation, all creation, Travails, groans, till THou shalt come!

verse.name: v6
